title: Daniels' lawyer alleges Russia payment to Cohen
text:
Daniels' lawyer alleges Russia payment to Cohen 12:56pm IST - 01:41
The lawyer for adult-film star Stormy Daniels claims that U.S. President Donald Trump's lawyer Michael Cohen received $500,000 from a Russian billionaire in the months after the 2016 U.S. election. Ryan Brooks reports.
The lawyer for adult-film star Stormy Daniels claims that U.S. President Donald Trump's lawyer Michael Cohen received $500,000 from a Russian billionaire in the months after the 2016 U.S. election. Ryan Brooks reports. //in.reuters.com/video/2018/05/09/daniels-lawyer-alleges-russia-payment-to?videoId=425152584&videoChannel=13423
